name: PublicHealthMeasureLibrary
title: Public Health Measure Library
description:
A Public Health Measure Library contains essential ConceptMap, ValueSet, CodingSystem,
NamingSystem, SearchParameter, CQL definitions or other resources for measure evaluation.

element.short: Each resource must have a url.
element.comment: The url for resource defined in The Situation Awareness for Novel Epidemic Response IG will follow IG URL naming conventions.

element.short: Resources are versioned like IG's 0.1.0 = first development version, 0.2.0 - first published for review version, 1.0.0 first official version ...
Each resource must have a name.
element.comment: The name should be in PascalCase, and should represent the Author's title of the resource.  Identify the Author to clarify
draft - The resource is still in development. active - The resource is ready for piloting or normal use.  retired - resource has been deprecated or replaced.

element.short: A resource must indicate its experimental status
element.comment: true - development, testing or pilots, false - production use

element.short: The name of the organization publishing this resource
The contact information for whom to contact about this resource
element.comment: At least one contact shall be an email

element.short: The ISO 3166 code for use context
The original author of the measure content, may be same as publisher, when otherwise, must include a relatedArtifact for the original author's publication
The author must be identified by name. Can be the name of an individual or an organization.
There must be contact information for the author.
element.comment: At least on author contact should be an email address.

element.short: There must be at least one artifact describing the measure in human readable form.
